name: Knight
flavor_text: An honorable fighter heavily armed and armored against the evils of the world.

fields.name: flavor
fields.text: Your flurry of attacks drive the enemy back.

fields.name: desc
fields.text:
When you make an attack action you may spend 1 stamina to attempt to also drive your enemy back 5ft. On a mix, you chose whether to damage or move the creature back. On a pass, you can do both.
If you chose to move a creature, they can opt to instead take an extra base attacks worth of damage to avoid being moved.

fields.name: flavor
fields.text: You sweep your attacks, aiming to harm all who stand in your way.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: When you take an attack action with a melee weapon, you may spend 1 stamina to attempt to also attack enemies adjacent to your target and within your weapons reach.

fields.name: flavor
fields.text: Your word is your bond, those who recognize your station believe you when you speak truth.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: When you take a Heart test to convince someone of true information, you gain a +3 on the test.

fields.name: flavor
fields.text: You swiftly step between your ally and danger.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: When an ally within 5ft of you would be hit by an attack or counter, you can spend 1 stamina to switch places with your ally, taking the hit for them.

fields.name: desc
fields.text: Increase one of your stats by 1 (max 5)
